caption.p: Personal protective equipment according to route of transmission for suspected or confirmed COVID-19 positive patient

tr.td: No physical contact and >2 m away from patient
During clinical care <2 m from patient
Waterproof apron*, gloves**, fluid-resistant surgical mask, eye protection
During AGPs e.g. intubation and extubation
Fluid resistant long-sleeved gown, gloves, eye protection and FFP3 or N95 mask

fn.p: * Use surgical gown if sterile procedure. ** Use sterile gloves if required by the procedure. AGPs: Aerosol-generating procedures.
